name: Accident Prone Area
description: This sign warns drivers of an accident-prone area.

name: Give Way
description: This sign indicates that drivers must give way to others.

name: No Heavy Vehicles
description: This sign prohibits heavy vehicles from entering.

name: Pedestrians Only
description: This sign indicates an area restricted to pedestrians.

name: Steep Descent
description: This sign warns of a steep descent ahead.

name: Airport
description: This sign indicates the direction to an airport.

name: Hospital
description: This sign indicates the location of a hospital.

name: No Horn
description: This sign prohibits the use of horns in the area.

name: Railway Crossing
description: This sign indicates a railway crossing ahead.

name: Stop
description: This sign indicates that drivers must stop.

name: Airport Shuttle
description: This sign indicates the availability of an airport shuttle service.

name: No Overtaking
description: This sign prohibits overtaking other vehicles.

name: Right Turn
description: This sign indicates a right turn ahead.

name: Tramway
description: This sign indicates the presence of a tramway.

name: Animal Crossing
description: This sign warns drivers of animals crossing the road.

name: Keep Left
description: This sign instructs drivers to keep to the left.

name: No Parking
description: This sign prohibits parking in the area.

name: Roundabout
description: This sign indicates the presence of a roundabout ahead.

name: Truck Route
description: This sign designates a route for trucks.

name: Bridge
description: This sign indicates the presence of a bridge.

name: Keep Right
description: This sign instructs drivers to keep to the right.

name: No Stopping
description: This sign prohibits stopping in the area.

name: School Zone
description: This sign indicates the presence of a school zone.

name: Tunnel
description: This sign indicates the presence of a tunnel ahead.

name: Broken Road
description: This sign warns drivers of a broken road ahead.

name: Left Turn
description: This sign indicates a left turn ahead.

name: No Trucks
description: This sign prohibits trucks from entering.

name: Slippery Road
description: This sign warns drivers of a slippery road ahead.

name: Two Way Traffic
description: This sign indicates the presence of two-way traffic.

name: Bumpy Road
description: This sign warns drivers of a bumpy road ahead.

name: Men at Work
description: This sign indicates the presence of road work ahead.

name: No U-Turn
description: This sign prohibits U-turns at the intersection.

name: Speed Limit 40
description: This sign indicates a speed limit of 40 km/h.

name: Cyclists
description: This sign indicates a route designated for cyclists.

name: Narrow Bridge
description: This sign warns of a narrow bridge ahead.

name: One Way
description: This sign indicates a one-way road.

name: Speed Limit
description: This sign indicates the speed limit on the road.

name: Falling Rocks
description: This sign warns drivers of falling rocks in the area.

name: Do Not Enter
description: This sign prohibits entry into the marked area.

name: Pedestrian
description: This sign indicates a pedestrian crossing.

name: Steep Ascent
description: This sign warns drivers of a steep ascent ahead.
